TopicTitle: Do the fastest Grand tour in Kerbalism.

Articles.Content:
Badge coming soon.

1:@king of nowhere at 15 years with his DREAM BIG mission. This weighed 3.6 kilotons, and that was just the mothership. He sent up the other shuttles in a set of daring and difficult launches. He even performed a suborbital catch on moho with ion engines to save a lander which ran out of fuel, losing the lander, meant mission over. This shows a huge sense of dedication and skills. He also braved Jool's deadly radiation belts. Radiation in the inner belts could have killed his kerbals in 2 hours, in the outer belt he'd be dead meat in days. The inner belt stretched to laythe and the outer belt to tylo, making him have to scramble.

Edited March 12, 2021 by Single stage to ocean
